properties.name: Promenade Meadows Park
properties.description: Local park area - exercise caution when flying. Check for local bylaws and respect privacy of nearby residents.
properties.restrictions: Follow municipal bylaws. Avoid flying over people or private property. Maintain safe distance from playground areas.
properties.notes: Good flying spot but be mindful of park visitors and surrounding residential areas.

properties.name: Promenade Meadows Area
properties.description: Residential area near Promenade Meadows. Use caution - yellow rated zone.
properties.restrictions: Respect privacy. Fly during daylight hours only. Keep noise to minimum.
